_header: Wherefore wherefore make ye three nays why

BLHar682.First Lines:
Wherfore wherfore make ye þre nayes whiMe thynke þei nede
                    not spoken ben so oft…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…If in your silf þat ye were wele bithoughtWhat cuase se
                    ye to say nay fy fy fy
BLHar682.Note: As written, repeats first words of lines 1-2 at end to indicate going back to first four lines of the roundel.
